original_text: If anyone is worried that he might not be acting honorably toward the virgin he is engaged to, and if his passions are too strong and he feels he ought to marry, he should do as he wants. He is not sinning. They should get married.
korean_text: 그러므로 만일 누가 자기의 약혼녀에 대한 행동이 합당하지 못한 줄로 생각할 때에 그 약혼녀의 혼기도 지나고 그같이 할 필요가 있거든 원하는 대로 하라 그것은 죄 짓는 것이 아니니 그들로 결혼하게 하라

sentences.original_text: that he might not be acting honorably
toward the virgin he is engaged to
and if his passions are too strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그의 정욕이 너무 강하다면

sentences.original_text: and he feels he ought to marry
he should do as he wants
